name: The Bob
description:
What to do and how to control it:

Arrows for movement

X - fire your weapon

C - throw granade

Space - jump/double jump

E - for pressing the elevator button

You are Bob. And you are stuck somewhere deep surounded by zombies. Find 3 Cog wheels, Repair the elevator and get home in one piece. You will have to go deeper and deeper as that was the theme of LudumDares 48th game jam.

I am proud of my creation, however there are lots of things that are missing, since I have underestimated the given time. But I hope you will have some fun with my creation! If so, please leave me some feedback, and if don´t leave feedback as well.

Thanks for your time.

I have enjoyed this a lot!

I have been using Aseprite for pixel-art, UNITY as game engine and FL Studio for music and sounds.
